statements: SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE complaint_category='Service';
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_name, feedback_date FROM PassengerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_name FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE feedback_date='2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE passenger_name='Alice' AND complaint_category='Food';
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE complaint_category = 'Service';
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE complaint_category IN ('Staff Behavior', 'Food Quality');
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_name, feedback_text FROM PassengerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM passenger_feedback;
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback;
SELECT * FROM complaint_tracking WHERE complaint_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT passenger_name, complaint_text, complaint_status FROM complaint_tracking ORDER BY complaint_id DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaint_tracking WHERE complaint_status = 'Open';
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_name FROM passenger_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM complaint_tracking ORDER BY complaint_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM passenger_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback WHERE passenger_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM transportation_services WHERE service_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM passenger_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM passenger_feedback WHERE passenger_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_id, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_type, service_rating FROM transportation_services WHERE service_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY service_name;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM passenger_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM passenger_complaints WHERE passenger_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY complaint_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM passenger_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT passenger_name, service_name, service_rating FROM transportation_services ORDER BY service_rating DESC;
SELECT action_description, action_date FROM improvement_actions WHERE responsible_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_name, feedback_text, rating FROM passenger_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY complaint_id DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_rating FROM transportation_services WHERE service_type = 'Shuttle' AND service_rating >= 4.0;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM improvement_actions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passenger_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, passenger_name FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT rating, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY rating;
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM passengers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE resolved = FALSE AND complaint_text LIKE '%rude%';
SELECT passenger_name, email, phone_number FROM passengers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY passenger_id;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' OR end_location = 'City B';
